message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. I'm willing to negotiate, but I think this is a good starting point.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice. How about a 55/45 split? It's still a good deal for you considering the inflation.
Let's be reasonable, Bob.  We've both lost some value due to inflation. A 50/50 split seems fair at this point.
